name: Rebecca Kunoff
text: Got notification that my order was ready. Told "Joe" my name for the order only for him to proceed to answer phones and make people's orders.  He said it would be a minute which turned into 5+!! Then the delivery guy came in. Not helpful …More

name: Appache Fresh
text: My food was delicious and The staff moved like a well oiled machine. Everybody was safe and sanitary and all staff were wearing masks.

name: HALFMAN HALFAMAZING
text: The stuff cheese bread is awesome when she makes it, not him. Lol. Real talk.

name: Stephen Jacobs
text: It took a while to get the pizza and we got it home it wasn't that good don't know why just did not taste good it was doey tasting

name: Charles Artificer
text: Great pizza place, good fast service. Never had a bad experience here. Even on the busy days have got a pizza here much faster than other business.

name: edd carrico
text: Ordered Howie mowie. Should I say howie salty....don't know what was sprinkled over the toppings,but had to drink 2 sodas per slice.

name: Deborah W
text: Delicious pizza and oven baked subs

name: Greg Spitler
text: If you like mushrooms on your pizza Howie's uses fresh ones sliced thin which when ordered at 4 times the amount results in one of the best pizzas I've ever had. My personal favorite is 4x mush, 1x onion on original round crust (no flavoring).

name: Shirley
text: Delicious pizza! Excellent customer service! Update: Even a year later, I have never had a problem at this location, either in terms of food quality or customer service. And honestly I'm quite picky when it comes to food. Kudos to them for …More

name: Preston Smiddy
text: Best hungry Howie's I've had this one in saline is on point fit a dub yesterday and it was really good.

name: Tonya Johnson
text: Amazing rewards program,easy to earn a free medium pizza plus you get one for your birthday too. Always amazing food and the staff are all super friendly!

name: s w
text: Good fast service, definitely will be back for more great pizza

name: Justin Weasel
text: The delivery man Chris was a very nice guy and got to my house quick.

name: Jason Tizedes
text: Get pizza here weekly. Always friendly when we walk in. They know me by face now and when they see me coming they get the pizza out and ready. Always made to order and always ready when I walk in the door. Our favorite pizza place in town.

name: Raquel Oberg
text: Just not happy with this hungry Howie's. Not impressed. Won't go back.

name: Moe A
text: Mmmm...Love the flavored crust.

name: John Golec
text: Ordered a deep dish got a standard pizza , showed them , they acted like I got it wrong .I believe, they over charged us

name: Bystander
text: Great place to stop on my way through town for something to quick to eat. Never had a problem here.

name: Azzam Aziz
text: Placed an order online at 5:13 PM. Called at 6:20 PM and was told that the order was cancelled. I did not receive a call nor an email regarding it. They said they cannot deliver due to weather. Understandable, but the communication was not.

name: johnathan cox
text: You know you want to eat here, just do it.

name: Derek Dickson
text: Awesome place. Jude hard at work and always makes sure customers are not waiting long for their pizza.

name: James Schmidt
text: They help us out on big orders early in the morning. Flavored crust is amazing

name: stacie clayton
text: I accidentally was charged twice for my order. Mistakes happen, what I don't understand is why after calling 4 times to try to get the issue resolved, I received no call back. The 3rd time I called the manager told me to wait a week to see …More

name: marie mielke
text: This is one of the best hungry howie's. Always nice and friendly when i go in. Always on time when i get delivery.

name: Bill Salisbury
text: Staff is rude food is good thay really need to work on customer service I'll never spend my money there again

name: Jim Hayes
text: Super consistent, and for 3 mediums @ $15 it's by far the best tasting inexpensive pizza.

name: Ryan Stewart
text: Meh. Cold pizza not very good.

name: Beth Kissella
text: I am updating my review from a year ago, They have let the rude employee go and now when I go in there they are extremely friendly.  And the food is good.

name: Jeff Johnson
text: Called in a order for pickup,when I got there a few minutes before estimated time I was watching them handle my food,when I seen a packet of sub sauce  hit the floor (then dude with long hair no hair net) he proceeded to pick it up off floor then put it in with my sub..ummm no thanks would like a refund.

name: Aaron Crawford
text: Excellent staff!

name: Craig Rosacrans
text: Da bomb

name: Tabatha Obuch-Stanley
text: Looovvveee it

name: Tis Rachel
text: These guys were my absolute go to for the area  but the last few times we've gone they've kinda dropped the ball

name: Jackie Vogt
text: Good pizza, love the crust flavor options

name: Vena Norton
text: Yummy carry out pizza!

name: Jim Kingsnorth
text: Crappy pizza

name: JOKEUR MIND666
text: It's a okay place.

name: Josephine Collins
text: It's honestly hit or miss.

name: Austin Martin
text: I've had deliveries from them before and the most recent being last week and now you guys don't deliver to my place of work? Never will buy from here again because I know for a fact they have delivered here on multiple occasions
